org.opendaylight.controller.sal.connect.netconf.sal

Class NetconfDeviceRpc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.connect.netconf.sal.NetconfDeviceRpc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Provider.ProviderFunctionality, RpcImplementation

    public final class NetconfDeviceRpc
extends java.lang.Object
implements RpcImplementation
    Invokes RPC by sending netconf message via listener. Also transforms result from NetconfMessage to CompositeNode.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedRpcs

        public java.util.Set<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName> getSupportedRpcs()
        Description copied from interface: RpcImplementation
        A set of rpc types supported by implementation. The set of rpc QNames which are supported by this implementation. This set is used, when Provider is registered to the SAL, to register and expose the implementation of the returned rpcs.
        Specified by:
        getSupportedRpcs in interface RpcImplementation
        Returns:
        Set of QNames identifying supported RPCs

      • invokeRpc

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.RpcResult<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode>> invokeRpc(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName rpc,
                                                                                                                                                                     org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.data.api.CompositeNode input)
        Description copied from interface: RpcImplementation
        Invokes a implementation of specified RPC asynchronously.
        Specified by:
        invokeRpc in interface RpcImplementation
        Parameters:
        rpc - RPC to be invoked
        input - Input data for the RPC.
        Returns:
        Future promising an RpcResult containing the output of the RPC if was executed successfully, the list of errors otherwise.
